headline: OXY's International Operations Are Powering Multi-Dimensional Growth
summary: Occidental's global upstream strategy, led by Middle East assets and low-carbon tech, cushions U.S. market risks and boosts stability.

headline: ExxonMobil Raises Output at Cepu Block, Boosts Indonesia's Oil Output
summary: XOM lifts Cepu Block output to 180,000 bpd, reinforcing its role in boosting Indonesia's oil production goals.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil Raises Output at Cepu Block, Boosts Indonesia's Oil Output

headline: Pure Lithium Founder & CEO Emilie Bodoin Recognized for Trailblazing Woman of the Year at 2025 Volta Foundation Awards at 17th Annual Fastmarkets Lithium Supply and Battery Raw Materials Conference
summary: BOSTON, June 27, 2025--Pure Lithium Corporation, a disruptive vertically integrated lithium metal battery technology company, is pleased to announce that its Founder, Chairman & CEO, Emilie Bodoin received special recognition for Trailblazing Woman of the Year Award Sponsored by ExxonMobil at the 2025 Fastmarkets Volta Awards Ceremony, in Las Vegas, Nevada on June 24.

raw.headline: Pure Lithium Founder & CEO Emilie Bodoin Recognized for Trailblazing Woman of the Year at 2025 Volta Foundation Awards at 17th Annual Fastmarkets Lithium Supply and Battery Raw Materials Conference
